item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 15, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ukraine launches war’s ‘largest’ drone attack on Russian airfields
2. Starbucks’ new chief awarded $113mn pay deal and remote office in Newport Beach
3. Columbia University president resigns after pressure over student Gaza protests
4. English council claims Dubai-based businessman misused £150mn
5. Barclays planned to shun Israeli bond sale under activist pressure
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 15, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
